name: M.A.X. 2: Mechanized Assault & Exploration
description: A level of complexity unseen in contemporary strategy gamesChoose either simultaneous or turn-based game mode to fit your personal preferencePlay as one of 8 human clans and use dozens upon dozens of land, sea and air units
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 590 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0
